channel.title: Need Help With [PI]
channel.description: Hello! I am adding recover special potions and i got this error: [img]http://img859.imageshack.us/img859/9843/30259554.png[/img] If someone could help me Plz tell me what should i do.

item.title: Need Help With [PI]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Nick I am Nick
item.description:
@I_am_Nick wrote:

at the top of the file where you added that you have to import it so where restoreDelay is defined is the file you need to import for instance if it was in client.java at the top of the file put
import server.model.players.Client;

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help With [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

Looks like ‘restoreDelay’ isn’t declared anywhere, so it can’t recognise it…

And are you sure you need that sort of timer, I always thought they were built in in PI, like so:

(This is for Antipoison, not Special Recover)

				case 2446:
				drinkAntiPoison(itemId,175,slot,30000); //Anti Poison
				break;

Then all I thought you had to do was add a void?

	public void drinkAntiPoison(int itemId, int replaceItem, int slot, long delay) {
		c.startAnimation(829);
		c.playerItems[slot] = replaceItem + 1;
		c.getItems().resetItems(3214);
		curePoison(delay);
	}

However, may be different considering it’s a recover special potion, post your code up, or the tutorial you followed and I’ll try to help

Read full topic
